title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 17, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 17, 2020
description:
On Today's Episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP takes a look at the Kings decision to part ways with GM Vlade Divac. Army West Point Head Football Coach Jeff Monken, Former NFL Player/ Fox NFL Analyst Chris Speilman and, NCAA Chief Medical Officer Brian Hainline all join the program. Plus, Is the title of "Student-Athlete" in for a change? DP weighs in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Plus, Is the title of "Student-Athlete" in for a change? DP weighs in.
